title.narrative: Improving Resilience and Emergency Response Project

description.narrative: The proposed Project Development Objective (PDO) is to enhance the resilience of Romanian Police Facilities that are critical to respond to Emergency Situations and disasters and to strengthen the institutional capacities for emergency preparedness and response.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
Ministry of Internal Affairs (General Inspectorate of Romanian Police)
Romania (through its Ministry of Public Finance)

title.narrative: Emergency response buildings which have been reconstructed with enhanced resilience
Grievances responded to within stipulated time
Reconstructed or retrofitted emergency response buildings which have added or enhanced gender responsive design features

Reconstructed or retrofitted emergency response buildings which have design features for universal access
